nodes.text: The Reog's Regiment was one of the largest independent mercenaries unit in the Outer Rim Territories and the Hutt Space during the Galactic Civil War. It was composed of two dreadnaughts, many frigates and gunships, two starfighters squadrons and 3,000 soldiers. The regiment struck a mining facility in a Wild Space system, but Lorka, a Hutt crime lord, hired a rival mercenary fleet to attack Reog's fleet in retaliation. He and his regiment were then hired by Grruna Thu, Gamorrean leader of the Shrook Clan, to attack the Hakks, a rival clan, in retaliation for destroying their outpost on Gamorr. The mercenaries were ultimately overwhelmed in the battle.
